2064.subject: JAPN
2064.descrlong: Alternative assessment for the third semester of Japanese. Freshmen and sophomore transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment must enroll in JAPN 101, 102, 201, and 202 concurrently, except for international students who may enroll only in JAPN 202. Junior and senior transfers attempting to satisfy the Language ULR through assessment, must enroll in JAPN 101, 102, and 201, except for international students who may enroll only in JAPN 201 or 202.
